import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { Registrar } from "./Registrar" import { Listar } from "./Listar" import { Estadistica } from "./Estadistica" import Logo from '../assets/img/geeksmart.jpg'; export const Menu = (props) => { const [reg, setReg] = useState(""); const [lis, setLis] = useState(""); const [est, setEst] = useState(""); function cerrarSesion(){ document.getElementById("caja_menu").style.display = "none"; document.getElementById("form_login").style.display = "block"; document.getElementById("txtusu").value = ""; document.getElementById("txtpas").value = ""; document.getElementById("txtusu").focus(); } function op_registrar(){ setReg("1"); setLis("0"); setEst("0"); } function op_listar(){ setReg("0"); setLis("1"); setEst("0"); } function op_estadistica(){ setReg("0"); setLis("0"); setEst("1"); } return ( <>
